name: Space Haters
description:
Space Haters is a tough as nails vertical shoot 'em up featuring classic arcade-style gameplay and set in the ruthless world of intergalactic music



After another sell-out gig, Photon has once again asserted his galactic lyrical dominance. He gets word Gamma-Boi is organizing the after-party to end all after-parties in his honor. However, it is not going to be easy to reach. The other musical artists want a shot at the top and will do anything to get there. However, to Photon, they are just Haters. Space Haters. It is up to Photon to blast through the so-called "Monarchs of Music" and reach the afterparty of a light-year, and of course, look good whilst doing it.

Features

  • Vertical shoot 'em up action
  • Tough-as-nails, single-life arcade gameplay
  • Show your galactic dominance by getting to the top of the leaderboard
  • Spectacular 2D-artwork
  • Listen to a butt-bouncing soundtrack as you take down those intergalactic haters
  • Blast your way through 5 levels
  • Take on the Monarchs of Music in 5 heart-pounding boss battles

Xbox One/Xbox 360 Controller and headphones are strongly recommended



Remember to add to wishlist!
